data.title: Scandinavian Crime Fiction
data.meta_description: Scandinavian Crime Fiction - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a roadmap to help readers get started with Scandinavian crime fiction. It summarizes several influential and important works in the genre, beginning with Maj Sjöwall and Per Wahlöö's Martin Beck series. It then briefly outlines novels by Peter Høeg, Jo Nesbø, Henning Mankell, Arnaldur Indriðason, Yrsa Sigurðardóttir, Stieg Larsson, Håkan Nesser, Anne Holt, and Johan Theorin that were influential in bringing Scandinavian crime fiction to international audiences. The document serves to introduce readers to some of the landmark authors and titles in this popular genre.
